raul_kaul: Eisha, i respect your opinion and i think you have a point too when you say some one might have a high sex drive or is into multiple partners so its fine as long as they are honest about it to their partner. But i don't agree with the fact that we should consider cheating as an acceptable thing as someone commented on your post! By cheating someone we are cheating them emotionally and thats a huge thing! People don't get into relationships only because they want to be loved and if one day that love stops coming they feel devastated. People get into relationships for companionship(emotional, social etc) and that's such a beautiful thing in itself, there is emotional support and strength one gets from their partner. Yes we shouldn't base our entire happiness on someone but that should not mean that cheating can be an acceptable thing in this generation or generations to come! Please lets not spread this opinion that its OK to cheat!
